item.title: Configuration File: config.toml
item.description: This is the Minimo’s configuration file ( config.toml ) file of this site: baseURL = "https://mannuan.github.io/" title = "mannuan" # for smart copyright line, leave this blank and check [params.copyright] copyright = "" theme = "minimo" disqusShortname = "" googleAnalytics = "" Paginate = 10 preserveTaxonomyNames = true enableRobotsTXT = true # generate robots.txt # Syntax Highlighting ( https://gohugo.io/content-management/syntax-highlighting/ ) pygmentsCodefences = true enableEmoji = true # Missing translations will default to this content language defaultContentLanguage = "en" [params.
